search.query: index=* sourcetype="sysmon" | fillnull process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path src user _time | stats count by process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path src user _time | lookup process_detections process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path user | rex field=process_name "^(?<single>\w)\.\w+$$" | eval analytic_id=if(isnull(single),analytic_id,53), score=if(isnull(single),score,50) | search score=* | eval ascore=mvzip(analytic_id, score,"|") | stats count by process_exec process_path process parent_process_exec parent_process_path src user _time ascore | mvexpand ascore | rex field=ascore "(?<analytic_id>[^\|]+)\|(?<score>[^\|]+)"
